BBK01.SUD217: New business (volumes) of German banks / Housing loans to households with an initial rate fixation of over 1 year and up to 5 years

General: Estimated. The volume of new business is extrapolated to form the underlying total using the Horvitz-Thompson estimator. Secured and unsecured loans for home purchase, including building and home improvements; including loans granted by building and loan associations and interim credits as well as transmitted loans granted by the reporting agents in their own name and for their own account. p = Provisional
